Photographer: [Photographer's Name] If the photographer's name is not known please indicate IPPA Staff as the Photographer
label: Secretary General of the Labour Party, Nissim Zvivli, visited the Jordan Valley and met with its settlers in order to try to allay the fears of local Jewish residents in the wake of the "Gaza/Jericho First" planned peace accords.
